Module it.polimi.ingsw
Package it.polimi.ingsw.santorini.model

Interface GameDelegate

All Known Implementing Classes:
Controller
public interface GameDelegate
Brief Bridge between SantoriniGame and the Controller It's responsible for the three main parts of the game: -setup -move and build -rendering
